name: Traganitsa Apartments

reviews.text: We stayed in a 2 bedroom apartment for 12 days.
reviews.title: Peaceful getaway

reviews.text: With a fully equipped kitchen and a lovely view over the olive trees to the sea, we didn't feel the need to be on the road all day long.
reviews.title: Sit back and relax at Traganisa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The makeshift playground on the plot was a pleasant surprise for our one year old.
reviews.title: We will come back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Many beaches are just a short drive away.
reviews.title: I love Traganitsa !

description: The apartments ‘Traganitsa’ are an excellent choice of stay for your vacation in Messinia, combining modern services with romantic nostalgia, quiet picturesque environment with the wonderful view to the bay of Pylos and the sunset in the Ionion Sea.
